thread.title: UK Airport Car Parks Launch Campaign To Help Holidaymakers Gain Cheaper Holidays
thread.title_full: UK Airport Car Parks Launch Campaign To Help Holidaymakers Gain Cheaper Holidays

author: prbuzz.com
title: UK Airport Car Parks Launch Campaign To Help Holidaymakers Gain Cheaper Holidays
text:
With the rise in the cost of living and the prices of a holiday on the increase, a travel expert has launched a campaign to offer tips and advice on how consumers can get better holiday deals.
UK Airport Car Parks who help people to reduce the cost of airport car parking has launched an advice campaign to help consumers learn the tricks of booking a cheap holiday.
For many years now consumers have used the high street travel agent as their main source for booking a family holiday. However, UK Airport Car Parks has said this could be expensive, and people could be wasting a great deal of money.
To help consumers save money on their family holiday, the travel experts has put together some tips, which include avoiding the high street travel agent. Through their tips and advice, thousands of consumers have reported saving up to £500 on a family holiday.
A spokesman for UK Airport Car Parks said: “We have watched how high street travel agents have been increasing their prices and felt it was very unfair. With people having less money than they did five years ago we decided to take action and offer our expert advice.”
Consumers have been overjoyed with the advice, but not everyone is happy. High street travel agents who have seen more people book holidays online than through their shops are not happy at the advice.
With the tips and tricks, consumers can have more money in their pocket to spend while they are on holiday. The extra money could be used to pay for a hotel upgrade according to the travel experts.
To learn more about UKairportcarparks.co.uk, and how to save money on parking a car at a UK airport, please visit http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/ or to read the tips on how to have cheaper holidays, please visit http://www.ukairportcarparks.co.uk/blog/tips-on-cheaper-holidays/
About UK Airport Car Parks
UK Airport Car Parks provides car owners with a comparison site that allows them to find secure airport car parks at up to 60% cheaper than the normal price.
